data.body:
when the page reloads it goes into 'all repositories' 

all repositories should only be the default when explicitly selected by the user.  otherwise the default should be dynamic - the last repo selected.  if no repo was ever selected, use the first repo in the list.  if no repo was ever created, the /beads path should redirect to the repo management screen or lightbox.
